modules.title: Module 3: The Box Model
modules.description: Understand how every element is a box with margins, borders, and padding.

lessons.title: The CSS Box Model
lessons.theory: All HTML elements can be considered as boxes. The CSS box model is essentially a box that wraps around every HTML element. It consists of: margins, borders, padding, and the actual content.
